title: Diamondback
full_text:

Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
rye whiskey
3/4
ounce
applejack
3/4
ounce
green Chartreuse
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
